Name: Third Hegemony Lancers
Details: The Third Hegemony Lancers are a Terran Hegemony Armed Forces unit, consisting of a mixed regiment of BattleMech and armor units. The Third is led by Major Mary Julius, a well-liked but relatively untested commander. The Third Hegemony Lancers is one of the youngest units in the THAF, even by the young Hegemony's standards, and has yet to be fully bloodied in battle.
